content:
Yo, what's good? I'm here to bring the heat,
With a toaster that's off the beat,
It sings while it toasts, it's a real treat,
But before I show you, let me speak,

'Bout the word of Jehovah, it's the truth,
It'll bring you joy and eternal youth,
So listen up close, don't be aloof,
'Cause I ain't leavin' till you hear the proof,

So what you say, you wanna hear more?
I'll drop knowledge like a slammin' door,
I'll bring the heat, I'll bring the fire,
I'll take you higher and higher,

But first things first, let me show you,
This toaster that'll make your day new,
So what you say, you wanna take a look?
I'll be here waiting, just give me the hook.
